column1: Little Goat Diner////Put in our name for a table
column2: expressing a preference for outdoor seating. While we waited
column3: went to the coffee bar- I had just a regular coffee
column4: but it was excellent! Waited about 30-40 minutes for our table
column5: which was fine (brunch is always so busy)
column6: and were seated to our outdoor table! best spot in the house for sure.
